bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext: https://oss.oetiker.ch/rrdtool/.pics/rrdtool.gif exists - so can someone please fix that idiotic image reference to //oss.oetiker.ch/rrdtool/.pics/rrdtool.gif which would use the proctol of the embedding page so that i don't need to seek that thing after every update and remove it?
Thanks for the report. I agree that this can be annoying. I'll see if we can patch it.
